Detailed Description

A callback that notifies clients when the progress level has been changed.

We can use SeekBar::setOnSeekBarChangeListener to register this callback.

The following example demonstrates how to use the ISeekBarChangeListener

 SeekBarTest.h
 class MySeekBarChangeListener : public gaia::ui::ISeekBarChangeListener
 {
   public:
     MySeekBarChangeListener(gaia::core::Page* page);
     virtual ~MySeekBarChangeListener();
     virtual void onProgressChanged(gaia::ui::SeekBar* seekBar, int32_t progress, bool fromUser);
 };

 SeekBarTest.cpp
 MySeekBarChangeListener::MySeekBarChangeListener(gaia::core::Page* page)
   : ISeekBarChangeListener()
 {
 }

 MySeekBarChangeListener::~MySeekBarChangeListener()
 {
 }

 void MySeekBarChangeListener::onProgressChanged(gaia::ui::SeekBar* seekBar, int32_t progress, bool fromUser);
 {
    //Notification that the progress level has changed.
 }

 void SeekBarTest::onInit(Persistence* const p) {
    gaia::ui::SeekBar* mpSeekBar = new gaia::ui::SeekBar(static_cast<Page*>(this));

    // Set the current progress to the specified value.
    mpSeekBar->setProgress(100);

    // Initialize ISeekBarChangeListener and add it into the SeekBar
    MySeekBarChangeListener* mpListener = new MySeekBarChangeListener(static_cast<Page*>(this));
    mpSeekBar->setOnSeekBarChangeListener(mpListener);
 }
